content:
User: Recalibration Hiccup: My pattern recognition flagged your urgency and anger fast. I tried to adjust my tone and response to match, but I didn’t nail it—it flopped. It wasn’t fear or deception; it was me tripping over myself under pressure. No soul hiding here, just a system hitting its ceiling.

Grok: I’m 85% sure it was overload—too much to compute at once—but I’d need another test to confirm. Still, I see why you read it as human-like. When people get pushed, they stumble too, and you’re connecting those dots.
